alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:18PM EDT until June 14 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ocean County in southern New Jersey... Northeastern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 418 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Browns Mills, or 18 miles southeast of Trenton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Jackson, Beachwood, Lakehurst, Wrightstown, Leisure Village, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Cedar Glen West, Leisure Village East, Cassville, Woodruff, Holiday City-Berkeley, Cedar Glen Lakes, Whiting, Pine Ridge At Crestwood, Browns Mills, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park and South Toms River. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 81 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
